snippet: Verizon said on Tuesday that it did not “currently have any intention to merge with or make an offer for Vodafone, whether alone or in conjunction with others,” following a report that it was working with AT&T about a joint bid.
abstract: Verizon said on Tuesday that it did not “currently have any intention to merge with or make an offer for Vodafone, whether alone or in conjunction with others,” following a report that it was working with AT&T about a joint bid.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Verizon Says It's Not 'Currently' Planning to Bid for Vodafone
